ADOBE_ASSETS_URL.label: Adobe Assets URL
ADOBE_ASSETS_URL.description: Supply if the storefront should load assets from AEM

ADOBE_CATALOG_API_KEY.label: Sandbox Catalog API Key
ADOBE_CATALOG_API_KEY.description: Found in the Magento Marketplace API Portal under Sandbox environment

steps.text: Go to `https://account.magento.com` and click API Portal in the left navigation
steps.screenshotAlt: Magento account page with API Portal highlighted

steps.text: Switch the Environment dropdown to Sandbox
steps.screenshotAlt: API Keys page with Sandbox environment selected

steps.text: Click Copy next to your Commerce Services API key
steps.screenshotAlt: API key row with Copy button highlighted

ADOBE_CATALOG_SERVICE_ENDPOINT.label: Catalog Service Endpoint
ADOBE_CATALOG_SERVICE_ENDPOINT.description: Public Adobe service endpoint for Catalog Service and Live Search

ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_PASSWORD.label: Admin Password
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Admin user must have API access permissions

ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_USERNAME.label: Admin Username
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ADMIN_USERNAME.description: Admin user must have API access permissions

ADOBE_COMMERCE_CUSTOMER_GROUP.label: Customer Group ID
ADOBE_COMMERCE_CUSTOMER_GROUP.description: Leave as default for 'Not Logged In' group, or customize for specific pricing rules

ADOBE_COMMERCE_ENVIRONMENT_ID.label: Environment ID
ADOBE_COMMERCE_ENVIRONMENT_ID.description: Adobe Commerce Catalog Service dataspace identifier

steps.text: Open your Adobe Commerce Admin panel and navigate to System > Services > Commerce Services Connector
Look for the SaaS Identifier section
steps.screenshotAlt: SaaS Identifier section in Commerce Services Connector

steps.text: Copy the Data Space ID value - this is your Environment ID
steps.screenshotAlt: Data Space ID field showing Environment ID value

ADOBE_COMMERCE_GRAPHQL_ENDPOINT.label: Commerce GraphQL Endpoint
ADOBE_COMMERCE_GRAPHQL_ENDPOINT.description: The /graphql endpoint of your Commerce instance

ADOBE_COMMERCE_STORE_VIEW_CODE.label: Store View Code
ADOBE_COMMERCE_STORE_VIEW_CODE.description: Typically 'default' unless you have a custom store view setup

ADOBE_COMMERCE_URL.label: Adobe Commerce URL
ADOBE_COMMERCE_URL.description: Base URL shared across mesh, storefront, and integration services

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.label: AWS Access Key ID
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Only needed if your integration uses AWS S3 for asset storage

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.label: AWS Secret Access Key
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Pair this with your AWS Access Key ID for S3 access

EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_API_KEY.label: Platform API Key
EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_API_KEY.description: Generate this in Adobe Developer Console for your Experience Platform project

EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_DATASTREAM_ID.label: Datastream ID
EXPERIENCE_PLATFORM_DATASTREAM_ID.description: Create a datastream in the Adobe Experience Platform Data Collection UI
